title: Temperature Conversion
description:
TEMPERATURE converts diferent, in practice common used units for
temperature. Normally, only the input to be converted is occupied and the
remaining inputs remain free. However, if several inputs loaded with va￾lues, the values of all inputs are converted accordingly and then summed.
1 K = 273.15 °C
1 °C = 273.15 K
1 °F = °C * 1.8 + 32
1 Re = °C * 0.8
1 Ra = K * 1.8
23. Control Modules
name: TEMPERATURE

input.name: C
input.description: Celsius conversion base value, initialized to -273.15.

input.name: F
input.description: Fahrenheit conversion base value, initialized to -459.67.

input.name: Re
input.description: Réaumur conversion base value, initialized to -218.52.
